title: 1br - Custom design condo:HW,W/D,granite/stainless/DW,Frplc,Parking
map_address: w. North ave near N. LaSalle blvd
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Rarely available one of a kind designer remodeled 1BR/1BA condo in a highly desirable 4-flat vintage building in the heart of the Old Town.   - One gated outdoor parking space included - Ample closet space  - Hardwood floors  - Granite counter tops  - Stainless steel appliances  - Dishwasher  - Microwave - In-unit washer and dryer  - Central air and heat - Wood burning fireplace  - Custom made wooden shutters  - Built-in wine rack/cellar  Minutes to North Avenue Beach, The Second City, Green City Market, Wells Street restaurants, Old Town festivals. Short walking distance to Brown line trains, LaSalle and Clark street buses, Magnificent Mile, etc.
